meta_title: SPT67WL-22 15 Amp 7-1/4 in. Sidewinder Lightweight Circular Saw
description: Introducing the lightest pro circular saw on the market, the new SKILSAW SIDEWINDER circular saw model SPT6WL-22, from the company that invented circular saws. Legendary SKILSAW worm drive inspired technology has been integrated into this SIDEWINDER with our best-in-class Dual-Field motor invented specifically for saws. The combination of the lightweight housing and unique Dual-Field motor results in a saw that lets you power through the toughest days on the jobsite, year after year. Add the 56 degree precision beveling capacity and true grip to the list of benefits and you’ll be the hero among your peers. By the way, it comes with a Freud Diablo blade. Yeah, we thought you’d like that. The new lightweight SKILSAW SIDEWINDER, model SPT67WL-22. True to the Trade Since 1924.
short_description: 7-1/4 in. saw built with the lightweight housing and magnesium footplate combine to make this the lightest weight saw in its class  Best-in-class torque improves productivity and speed of cut  Our Dual-Field motor is especially designed for saws by providing increased cooling to extend tool life  7-1/4 in. 24 tooth Diablo carbide blade provides the optimal out-of-the-box experience  Dust blower clears the line of cut for increased accuracy  Stay True Guarantee provide 180 day, money-back guarantee plus a 1 year limited warranty

meta_title: SPT67WM-22 15 Amp 7-1/4 in. Sidewinder Magnesium Circular Saw
description: Made for trade professionals who take pride in their work, our new SKILSAW SIDEWINDER circular saw model SPT67WM-22 is the only all magnesium circular saw on the market, including the motor housing. The rugged magnesium motor housing keeps the motor cooler to give you powerful performance for a lifetime. Legendary SKILSAW worm drive inspired technology has been integrated into this SIDEWINDER with our best-in-class Dual-Field motor invented specifically for saws, for pros, for you.  Top it off with the 56 degree precision beveling capacity and you will be unstoppable. Did we mention a Freud Diablo blade is included? Yeah, it really is. The new SKILSAW SIDEWINDER all magnesium circular saw, SPT67WM-22. True to the Trade Since 1924.

meta_title: 9296-01 7.5 Amp 4-1/2 in. Paddle Switch Angle Grinder
description: With user safety in mind, the new Skil 9296-RT 7.5 Amp 4-1/2 in. Paddle Switch Angle Grinder features a non-locking paddle switch that automatically turns off when released or dropped. With other traditional grinders, the power switch is located on the top of the tool, but on the 9296-01, the power switch is found on the bottom of the tool right where you hold on to it. This way, the tool is powered when you're ready to use it and automatically turns off when released or dropped.
short_description: Powerful 7.5 amp motor delivers optimal performance for even the toughest applications  Paddle switch with no lock-on automatically turns off when released or dropped  Heavy-duty metal gear housing offers added durability and extended service life  Three position anti-vibration auxiliary handle minimizes user fatigue while improving control  Tool-less guard adjustment makes it easy to quickly adjust for increased versatility

description: With a fully integrated bit management system built into the front of the tool, the Skil 2356-01 4V Max Cordless Lithium-Ion 360 Quick-Select Screwdriver houses 12 of the most commonly used bits in a rotating compartment, eliminating the need to stop working on your project to search for the right bit needed for the job. With the simple twist of the cartridge you can switch between a Phillips, square or torx bit, among others, in a matter of seconds. The under-lit LED bit window conveniently displays which bit is selected for use, the forward/reverse indications that show you driving direction and the LED work light illuminates hard-to-see areas. Even if you haven't used the 360 Quick-Select in a while, it won't let you down because of its Lithium-Ion battery that stays charged for up to 18 months. Another unique feature of the 360 Quick-Select is the Micro USB cable that lets you re-charge the tool using a laptop or even phone charger; freeing up space on your standard outlet.
short_description: Fully integrated bit management features a 12-bit illuminated window magazine that keeps your most popular bits close at hand; just rotate to select desired bit  USB charging supports universal charging with computers, cell phones and car chargers for total flexibility  4V Lithium-Ion 1.5 Ah cell for plenty of power and longer run time with the ability of holding a charge for up to 18 months  Site-Light LED work light facilitates use in dimly lit areas  Battery level indicator shows when battery is in need of a charge

meta_title: 2354-08 4V Limited Edition Pink IXO Compact Max Lithium-Ion Driver with 5-Piece Bit Set
description: The SKIL 2354-08 is a powerful cordless screwdriver that fits neatly into the palm of your hand. The tool offers 4V of maximum power and high torque for greater efficiency. The tool's rubberized handle offers a secure, comfortable grip. The SKIL 2354-08 iXO 4V palm-sized screwdriver also has a built-in LED SiteLight that turns on automatically when you squeeze the trigger. The SiteLight is designed to be maintenance-free and lasts the life of the tool. The screwdriver also features a Lithium-Ion powered battery that holds a charge for up to 18 months in addition to being compact and weighing only 11 ounces. For added versatility and a solution that will solve many of your everyday cutting needs, the SKIL 2354-08 also comes with an innovative cutter attachment which provides an easy way to make sharp, precise cuts through a wide range of materials. The cutter attachment incorporates a blade guard to minimize the possibility of accidents, unlike traditional utility knives that can be dangerous. The cutter attachment is incredibly versatile and can cut through an assortment of different materials. The Limited Edition IXO Pink will help support breast cancer research through a donation to the Susan G. Komen Foundation.
short_description: For the second year in a row, the Limited Edition iXO Pink will help support breast cancer research through a donation to Susan G. Komen.  Lithium-Ion power holds charge up to 18 months  Sitelight LED work light illuminates work area nicely  1/4 in. Hex bit holder works with common bits for fast and easy bit changes

description: With a fully integrated bit management system built into the front of the tool, the Skil 2356-01 4V Max Cordless Lithium-Ion 360 Quick-Select Screwdriver houses 12 of the most commonly used bits in a rotating compartment, eliminating the need to stop working on your project to search for the right bit needed for the job. With the simple twist of the cartridge you can switch between a Phillips, square or torx bit, among others, in a matter of seconds. The under-lit LED bit window conveniently displays which bit is selected for use, the forward/reverse indications that show you driving direction and the LED work light illuminates hard-to-see areas. Even if you haven't used the 360 Quick-Select in a while, it won't let you down because of its Lithium-Ion battery that stays charged for up to 18 months. Another unique feature of the 360 Quick-Select is the Micro USB cable that lets you re-charge the tool using a laptop or even phone charger; freeing up space on your standard outlet.
short_description: Fully integrated bit management features a 12-bit illuminated window magazine that keeps your most popular bits close at hand; just rotate to select desired bit  USB charging supports universal charging with computers, cell phones and car chargers for total flexibility  4V Lithium-Ion 1.5 Ah cell for plenty of power and longer run time with the ability of holding a charge for up to 18 months  Site-Light LED work light facilitates use in dimly lit areas  Battery level indicator shows when battery is in need of a charge

meta_title: MAG77LT-RT 7-1/4 in. Magnesium Worm Drive Skilsaw
description: The legendary Worm Drive SKILSAW has been reborn to become the world's lightest worm drive saw! The MAG77LT 7-1/4 in. Magnesium Worm Drive Skilsaw has all the power and performance of the worm drive SKILSAW you love, but 4 lb. lighter to reduce user fatigue. The only thing taken out of the MAG77LT was the weight. The MAG77LT is still packed with lots of features such as a 53 degree bevel with zero adjust and positive stop at 45 degrees, a multi-function wrench stored in the foot that not only can be used for blade changes, it also fits the oil plug, doc and bevel nuts, brush cap, and more. Cut-Ready depth of cut system for quick, accurate depth adjustment, soft-grip handle for comfort and control, integrated saw hook, and anti-snag lower guard. The MAG77LT Worm Drive. More Mag. Less Weight.

description: Designed for the professional woodworker as well as the do-it-yourselfer, Skil's XDrive 7-1/2 in. Circular Saw delivers the reliable performance expected from Skil at an excellent value. Featuring a rugged 13 amp 2.3 horsepower motor, the 5485-01 powers through cuts while providing a smooth cutting action with its patented anti-snag lower guard. Two-point line of sight offers enhanced visual accuracy during the cut, and an integrated safety lock and guarded trigger increases user safety and minimizes accidental starts. With an array of advanced features to produce higher quality results, the 5485-01 XDrive 7-1/4 in. Circular Saw is sure to be an excellent addition to any tool collection.

meta_title: 7 In. Medusaw™ Walk Behind Worm Drive For Concrete
description: Stand up to big jobs with the only worm drive walk behind concrete saw. Cutting long control joints is simple with the new integrated handle that adjusts to your height and folds easily for transport and storage. Our legendary SKILSAW® worm drive power and a pivoting pointer deliver unmatched precision and convenience. Used wet or dry, the integrated dust management system controls dust for cleaner cuts. A two-finger trigger reduces user fatigue and improves control. The all metal components featuring rust-resistant brackets and fasteners protect from corrosion for longer life. Armed with the MEDUSAW™ Walk Behind, you'll power through the toughest concrete jobs standing up. You can always count on SKILSAW®.

meta_title: 7 In. Medusaw™ Worm Drive For Concrete
description: When there's concrete to conquer, MEDUSAW™ makes the job a whole lot easier. It's the world's first fully integrated saw designed specifically for scoring and cutting concrete accurately. Forget modifying an old saw. This one's got our legendary SKILSAW® worm drive power train, plus a unique Cut-Ready™ adjustable plunge lock and a pivoting pointer for unmatched precision and convenience. Used wet or dry, the dual integrated dust management system takes dust out of your way. And rust resistant brackets and fasteners resist corrosion for long life. Armed with MEDUSAW™, you'll power through the toughest concrete jobs. It's all part of the performance legend that is SKILSAW®.

description: The new 15 AMP Heavy Duty Reciprocating Saw delivers rugged, dependable performance unlike any reciprocating saw you've used before. Patented BUZZKILL™ Technology stops vibration dead in its tracks. The full-frame, linear counterbalance stops vibration at the source, instead of moving it around and shifting it to the user, as other saws do. The 15 Amp motor powers through the most demanding work, while Constant Response™ Electronics sense the load and immediately increase the power when you need it. That means comfortable, controlled cuts that don't wear on you or your tool. The 15 Amp Heavy Duty Reciprocating Saw joins the performance legend that is SKILSAW®.

description: From the creators of the first ever cordless worm drive, comes the 10-1/4 IN. cordless worm drive saw with legendary SKILSAW power to go anywhere. With a 3-11/16 IN. depth of cut, this cordless saw can cut 4x material in a single pass. Powered by the TRUEHVL battery, designed specifically for our legendary Worm Drive saw. The brushless motor responds to challenging applications by boosting power and torque, and all-magnesium construction makes it lightweight and tough. TRUEHVL features a unique battery design that maximizes heat dissipation, patented Stay Cool technology that wraps each cell in a temperature controlling material, and intelligent power management that monitors and optimizes each cell. Go from zero to full charge in only 1 hour. Get all the power you need, from the ONLY 10-1/4 IN. cordless Worm Drive saw. For optimal performance, recommended use with SKILSAW blade 76240. This kit includes a 10-1/4 IN. SKILSAW blade, 5.0Ah TRUEHVL lithium battery, and TRUEHVL Quick Charger. SKILSAW has redefined power. Again. What's Included: 1pcs 10-1/4 inch Cordless Worm drive bare tool, 1pcs SPTH15 battery, 1pcs SPTH14 charger, 1pcs SKILSAW blade,1pcs Auxiliary handle POWERED BY TRUEHVL – The battery platform designed to power worm drive. CUTS 4X IN ONE PASS - Powers through tough material with up to 3-11/16 IN. depth of cut. WORM DRIVE GEARING, ALL MAGNESIUM CONSTRUCTION, BRUSHLESS MOTOR, and ELECTRIC BRAKE – Legendary worm drive power and jobsite durability. INTEGRATED DUST EXTRACTION SYSTEM - Provides a dust management solution when working with a vacuum. PORTABILITY & PERFORMANCE – The convenience of a cordless circular saw without compromising Worm Drive power and performance. 0-51° DEGREE BEVEL CAPACITY – Easy bevel adjustments allow for a variety of bevel cuts and many applications. Compatible with all SKIL TRUEHVL tools and chargers
